title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: Attention Management in University Mathematics Classes Using Micro-Break Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can achieve a 20% improvement in quiz accuracy rates by applying 3-5 minute micro-breaks per 30-minute instructional block
Learners can extend sustained class concentration time by 1.5 times using attention restoration techniques (breathing exercises, stretching, etc.)
Learners can maintain grade variability below 30% when applying micro-breaks during weekly formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
